description1: With a maximum of 7 questions, you can make a well-founded assessment of whether a data-driven application qualifies as an AI system or as an high-impact algorithm. Fill out the dynamic questionnaire. Soon, additional questionnaires will be available for risk classification of AI systems. These questionnaires are primarily focussed on the (Dutch) public sector, but could be very usefull to other countries and sectors.
description2: This open-source template is tailored to the definition of an AI system as stated in the EU
description2_4: of the Dutch Ministry of the Interior.
feedback: Help develop and share feedback via
